alert.note: Alert for Union (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 5:31PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Union County through 600 PM EDT... At 531 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Blairsville, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Blairsville, Jones Creek, and Owltown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
